original_title: Ken Ham’s Foundations - Relevance of Genesis
overview: Why is Genesis so important?  In this 2-part video Ken Ham uses news stories of recent events combined with Scripture to address today’s most pressing issues. Includes scores of photos and illustrations, plus a mini-interview that reveals his passion for helping Christians to truly understand the distressing impact of disregarding the authority of Scripture.
title: Ken Ham’s Foundations - Relevance of Genesis
